answerText: standard deviation [or stdev; prompt on sigma] [10] This measure of central tendency is the value that occurs with the greatest frequency in a set of data.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 9 | 5 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The variance is the square of this quantity.  [10] Name this measure that equals the square root of the average of the squares of the mean deviations.
